snippet: Much of the attention has focused on Cory A. Booker, the mayor of Newark, who has built a national reputation as a rising star in the Democratic Party.
abstract: New Jersey residents are preparing to vote in a primary to fill a seat in the United States Senate, and candidates are traveling around the state to make their final pitches; much of the attention, both positive and negative, has focused on Mayor Cory A Booker of Newark, who has built a national reputation as a rising star for Democrats.

byline.contributor: Randy Leonard contributed reporting from Ewing Township, N.J.

lead_paragraph: Much of the attention has focused on Cory A. Booker, the mayor of Newark, who has built a national reputation as a rising star in the Democratic Party.

headline.main: In New Jersey, Short Senate Primary Race Ends With Final Appeals to Voters
headline.print_headline: In New Jersey, Short Senate Primary Race Ends With Final Appeals to Voters
